actionable_insights.insight: Cross-video insight: Every AI system needs traceability for reliable content generation

evidence_spans.text: The key insight here is that every AI system needs traceability.

actionable_insights.novelty_signal: Aligned with recent audience demand for verification.

actionable_insights.insight: Cross-video insight: The 8-stage approach enables modular debugging of pipeline components

evidence_spans.text: The beauty of this approach is that you can debug any stage independently. If stage 4 is giving weird classifications, you can run just that stage with fixed inputs and iterate quickly.

actionable_insights.novelty_signal: Aligned with recent audience demand for verification.

originality_and_novelty_signals: Highlights traceability through each pipeline stage.
